description: Send an encrypted message with optional reaction support (consolidates sendMessage + reaction sub-actions)

main.description: Send an encrypted message to an MLS conversation. Supports application messages, reactions (add/remove), and ephemeral delivery. The msgId serves as the idempotency key.

msgId.description: Client-generated ULID for message deduplication. MUST be included in MLS message AAD.

ciphertext.description: MLS encrypted message ciphertext bytes (MUST be padded to paddedSize)

epoch.description: MLS epoch number when message was encrypted

paddedSize.description: Padded ciphertext size in bytes (512, 1024, 2048, 4096, 8192, or multiples of 8192)

delivery.description: Delivery mode: 'persistent' (stored, replayed on sync) or 'ephemeral' (SSE only, not stored)

action.description: Optional sub-action: 'addReaction' or 'removeReaction' for reaction messages

reactionEmoji.description: Emoji for reaction (required when action is 'addReaction' or 'removeReaction')

targetMessageId.description: Message ID being reacted to (required when action is 'addReaction' or 'removeReaction')

messageId.description: Created message identifier (echoed from input msgId)

receivedAt.description: Server timestamp when message was received (bucketed to 2-second intervals)

errors.name: NotMember
errors.description: Caller is not a member of the conversation

errors.name: EpochMismatch
errors.description: Message epoch does not match current conversation epoch

errors.name: InvalidReaction
errors.description: Missing reactionEmoji or targetMessageId for reaction action

errors.name: InvalidAsset
errors.description: Payload or attachment pointer is invalid
